analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: rdo rje can gang 'di yi 'od kyis 'gro ba long byed mun rnams las rgyal byed //

original: gang zhig gnas skabs mthar thug dbyer med dpal ldan yon tan tshogs kyis mdzes pa dang / gang gi snying rje'i tshogs kyi bdud rtsis rab tu brlan pa'i thugs kyis shin tu spros pa ste //
analyzed: gang zhig gnas skabs mthar thug dbyer med dpal ldan yon tan tshogs kyis mdzes pa dang / gang gi snying rje'i tshogs kyi bdud rtsis rab tu brlan pa'i thugs kyis shin tu spros pa ste //

original: de dag rnams kyis spyod pa rmad byung 'di bsten shes rab rang bzhin khyed las myur gyur cig //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyis spyod pa rmad byung 'di bsten shes rab rang bzhin khyed las myur gyur cig //
translated: May you quickly attain this wonderful conduct, which is the nature of wisdom, through them.

analyzed: rdo rje phreng bas brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir //

analyzed: rdo rje 'chang spyod shin tu mdzes pa yis //

original: sna tshogs skyes pa sprul pa'i tshogs rnams kyis //
analyzed: sna tshogs skyes pa sprul pa'i tshogs rnams kyis //
translated: With the various emanated assemblies,

original: myur du don yod phun sum tshogs par shog /'dir ni chung du dang 'bring po dag gi rim pas ting nge 'dzin legs par bsgoms pa las shes rab mchog dang ldan pa la /
analyzed: myur du don yod phun sum tshogs par shog /'dir ni chung du dang 'bring po dag gi rim pas ting nge 'dzin legs par bsgoms pa las shes rab mchog dang ldan pa la /
translated: Here, through the sequence of the small and medium, from well cultivating meditative stabilization, one becomes endowed with supreme wisdom.

analyzed: @95a * // bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba dang bsdu ba'i byed pa po //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn is the agent of expansion and contraction.

original: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
translated: Endowed with the supreme of all aspects,

original: ye shes skad cig gis rdzogs pa //
analyzed: ye shes skad cig gis rdzogs pa //
translated: Perfect in an instant of wisdom,

original: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Is called ‚Äúperfect yoga.‚Äù

original: de yang bdag dang sems can thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'dod pa'i spro ba dang ldan pas /
analyzed: de yang bdag dang sems can thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'dod pa'i spro ba dang ldan pas /
translated: Moreover, with the enthusiasm of wishing to attain the state of Vajradhara for oneself and all sentient beings,

original: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa gzugs brnyan lta bur stong pa nyid dang ro gcig par nges par byas nas /
analyzed: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa gzugs brnyan lta bur stong pa nyid dang ro gcig par nges par byas nas /
translated: one should ascertain that the aggregates, constituents, sense spheres, and so on are like reflections, one taste with emptiness,

original: 'od rab tu gsal ba la rab tu zhugs te /
analyzed: 'od rab tu gsal ba la rab tu zhugs te /
translated: and enter into the state of brilliant light.

original: skad cig gi yan lag dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor pas yongs su bskor ba'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i sku stong pa nyid dang / snying rje ro gcig pa'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan cing thugs ka'i sa bon dang ldan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
analyzed: skad cig gi yan lag dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor pas yongs su bskor ba'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i sku stong pa nyid dang / snying rje ro gcig pa'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan cing thugs ka'i sa bon dang ldan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
translated: The nature of great bliss, which is of one taste with emptiness and compassion, is the nature of the lord of the family, who is crowned on the head and endowed with the seed syllable at the heart.

original: lha mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo la sogs pa dpag tu med pa spros te /
analyzed: lha mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo la sogs pa dpag tu med pa spros te /
translated: From that, immeasurable tathagatas, goddesses, bodhisattvas, wrathful ones, and so forth are emanated.

original: ji ltar gzhan la phan par nus pa'i chos ston pa la sogs pas gzhan bsod nams kyi tshogs mthar phyin pa la gzhag cing /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan la phan par nus pa'i chos ston pa la sogs pas gzhan bsod nams kyi tshogs mthar phyin pa la gzhag cing /
translated: They are placed in the perfection of the accumulation of merit through teaching the dharma and so forth, which is able to benefit others.

original: bsdu ba byas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i skur bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba byas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i skur bskyed par bya'o //
translated: Through the act of gathering, the inconceivable body is generated.

original: de la 'di'i yan lags sogs pa ni sa 'og gi mthar thug par ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyar /üîΩgcig tu sra zhing mkhregs la 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis sa gzhi dang bskal pa'i mtha'i me 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan pas mtshams bcing ba dang / sa 'og nas steng gi bar du shin tu mtho zhing mkhregs la sra zhing 'bar ba'i rdo rje ra ba dang /
analyzed: de la 'di'i yan lags sogs pa ni sa 'og gi mthar thug par ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyar / gcig tu sra zhing mkhregs la 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis sa gzhi dang bskal pa'i mtha'i me 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan pas mtshams bcing ba dang / sa 'og nas steng gi bar du shin tu mtho zhing mkhregs la sra zhing 'bar ba'i rdo rje ra ba dang /
translated: The vajra ground, which is the foundation of the celestial mansion, is as vast as the limits of the sky.üîΩThe vajra ground is a single solid mass of blazing vajras, which is as hard and firm as the very limits of the underworld. It is surrounded by a garland of blazing light rays, which are like the fire at the end of the eon.üîΩThe vajra fence is very high and firm, and it is made of blazing vajras. It extends from the underworld to the very limits of the sky.

original: rdo rje'i ra ba'i steng du bar mtshams med par dum bu gcig tu gyur cing steng du rdo rje'i mda'i dra ba dang / 'og tu rdo rje'i bla res brgyan pa'i rdo rje'i gur 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i ra ba'i steng du bar mtshams med par dum bu gcig tu gyur cing steng du rdo rje'i mda'i dra ba dang / 'og tu rdo rje'i bla res brgyan pa'i rdo rje'i gur 'bar ba'o //
translated: The vajra tent is a blazing vajra canopy, which is adorned with a net of vajra arrows. It is a single solid mass, which is above the vajra fence.

original: de'i nang du gnas pa'i sna chogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa ser po g-yas skor du 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: de'i nang du gnas pa'i sna chogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa ser po g-yas skor du 'khor ba'o //
translated: The variegated lotus and sun are located inside the vajra ground. The ten-spoked wheel is located on top of the lotus and sun. It is yellow and it spins clockwise.

original: de'i shar gyi rtsibs ya gshin rje mthar byed nag po /
analyzed: de'i shar gyi rtsibs ya gshin rje mthar byed nag po /
translated: On the eastern spoke is black Yamantaka,

original: zhal dkar po dang dmar po rdo rje'i tho ba nag po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: zhal dkar po dang dmar po rdo rje'i tho ba nag po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: with a white face and a red face, holding a black vajra hammer, a sword, a gem, and a lotus.

original: lho'i rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed dkar po zhal nag po dang dmar po /
analyzed: lho'i rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed dkar po zhal nag po dang dmar po /
translated: On the southern spoke is white Prajnantaka, with a black face and a red face,

original: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dgar po dang / ral gri dang / nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dgar po dang / ral gri dang / nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: holding a threatening gesture of a vajra-marked club, a sword, a gem, and a lotus.

original: nub @95b kyi rtsibs la padma mthar byed dmar po zhal sngon po dang dkar po /
analyzed: nub @95b kyi rtsibs la padma mthar byed dmar po zhal sngon po dang dkar po /
translated: On the western spoke is red Padmantaka, with a blue face and a white face,

original: padma dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: padma dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
translated: holding a red lotus, a sword, a gem, and a chakram.

original: byang gi rtsibs la bgegs mthar byed nag po zhal dkar po dang dmar po khro bo'i rdo rje dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: byang gi rtsibs la bgegs mthar byed nag po zhal dkar po dang dmar po khro bo'i rdo rje dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: On the northern spoke is black Vighnantaka, with a white face and a red face, holding an angry vajra, a sword, a gem, and a lotus.

original: mer 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon po zhal dkar po dang dmar po /
analyzed: mer 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon po zhal dkar po dang dmar po /
translated: In the southeast is blue Kamadeva, with a white face and a red face,üîΩholding a flower arrow, a bow, a hook, and a noose.

original: lcags kyu dang ral gri dang nor bu dang mtsho skyes 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: lcags kyu dang ral gri dang nor bu dang mtsho skyes 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He holds a hook, a sword, a gem, and a lotus.üîΩIn the southwest, blue staff-holder is black, with a white and a red face.

original: bden bral du dbyug pa sngon po nag po zhal dkar po dang dmar po dbyug pa sngon po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: bden bral du dbyug pa sngon po nag po zhal dkar po dang dmar po dbyug pa sngon po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He holds a blue staff, a sword, a gem, and a lotus.

original: rlung du stobs po che nag po zhal dkar po dang dmar po /
analyzed: rlung du stobs po che nag po zhal dkar po dang dmar po /
translated: In the wind direction, great strength is black, with a white and a red face.

original: rtse gsum pa dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: rtse gsum pa dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma bsnams pa'o //
translated: He holds a trident, a sword, a gem, and a lotus.üîΩIn the northeast, immovable is blue, with a white and a red face.

original: dbang ldan du mi g-yo ba sngon po zhal dkar po dang dmar po ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan du mi g-yo ba sngon po zhal dkar po dang dmar po ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He holds a sword, a gem, and a lotus.

original: steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ser po zhal sngon po dang dmar po /
analyzed: steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ser po zhal sngon po dang dmar po /
translated: Above, the crown-protrusion chakra-holder is yellow, with a blue and a red face.

original: 'khor lo ser po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo ser po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He holds a yellow chakra, a sword, a gem, and a lotus.üîΩBelow, the king of the wrathful is blue, with a white and a red face.

original: 'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po sngon po zhal dkar po dang dmar po rdo rje dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: 'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po sngon po zhal dkar po dang dmar po rdo rje dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma bsnams pa'o //
translated: He holds a vajra, a sword, a gem, and a lotus.

original: de la gtsug tor dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang mi g-yo ba dang gnod mdzes rnams ni rin po che'i cod pan can /
analyzed: de la gtsug tor dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang mi g-yo ba dang gnod mdzes rnams ni rin po che'i cod pan can /
translated: Among them, U·π£·πáƒ´·π£a, Desire King, Acala, and Sumbha have jeweled crowns.

original: rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par gyur pa /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par gyur pa /
translated: They are adorned with various jewels.

original: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa ston pa ;
analyzed: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa ston pa ;
translated: They display slightly bared fangs.

original: sma ra dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: sma ra dang bral ba'o //
translated: They are free of beards.

original: de las gzhan pa rnams ni mi sdug pa'i gzugs can smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pas dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa rnams ni mi sdug pa'i gzugs can smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pas dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
translated: The others have ugly forms, with eyebrows arched, and tawny hair bristling upward.

original: smin ma dang sma ra dmar ser dang bcas pa /üîΩzhal gdangs pa /üîΩmche ba gtsigs pa /
analyzed: smin ma dang sma ra dmar ser dang bcas pa / zhal gdangs pa / mche ba gtsigs pa /
translated: They have tawny eyebrows and beards.üîΩThey have gaping mouths.üîΩThey bare their fangs.

original: ljags 'gyur ba /
analyzed: ljags 'gyur ba /
translated: They have wagging tongues.

original: gad rgyangs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gad rgyangs dang ldan pa /
translated: They are endowed with laughter.

original: drag po'i klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa sku bong thung zhing rags pa lto ba 'phyang ba'o //
analyzed: drag po'i klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa sku bong thung zhing rags pa lto ba 'phyang ba'o //
translated: They are adorned with the eight fierce nƒÅgas, with short, stout bodies, and hanging bellies.

original: bcu po 'di dag ni g-yon brkyang ba g-yas bskum pas rtsibs kyi rtse mo la cung zad ma reg pa'i sna tshogs padma dang / nye ma'i gdan dang bcas pa brtan par gnas pa /üîΩnyi ma'i 'od can shin tu khros pa dang 'bar bas shin tu 'jigs pa bskal pa 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lta bu'i 'od dang ldan pa'i rang gi sku'i sprul ba dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyis kyang khams gsum mtha' yas pa na gnas ba'i bgegs kyi tshogs
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni g-yon brkyang ba g-yas bskum pas rtsibs kyi rtse mo la cung zad ma reg pa'i sna tshogs padma dang / nye ma'i gdan dang bcas pa brtan par gnas pa / nyi ma'i 'od can shin tu khros pa dang 'bar bas shin tu 'jigs pa bskal pa 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lta bu'i 'od dang ldan pa'i rang gi sku'i sprul ba dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyis kyang khams gsum mtha' yas pa na gnas ba'i bgegs kyi tshogs
translated: These ten are standing firmly on a variegated lotus and sun seat, with the left leg straight and the right knee bent slightly touching the tip of the petal.üîΩThey have the radiance of the sun, are extremely wrathful and blazing, and have the radiance of the fire at the time of the destruction of the universe.üîΩWith an assembly of countless emanations of their own bodies, they repeatedly destroy the entire assembly of obstructors dwelling in the limitless three realms.

original: ma lus pa yang dang yang du brlag par byed pa phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i @96a * //
analyzed: ma lus pa yang dang yang du brlag par byed pa phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i @96a * //
translated: The six-armed principal figures

original: phyag dag gis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
analyzed: phyag dag gis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
translated: embrace a wisdom consort similar to themselves with their two principal arms.

original: zhal gsum pa khyad par du rtsa ba'i zhal gyi mdog ni sku mdog lta bu ste /
analyzed: zhal gsum pa khyad par du rtsa ba'i zhal gyi mdog ni sku mdog lta bu ste /
translated: The three faces are special. The color of the principal face is the same as the color of the body.

original: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa yi ni gong du brjod do //
analyzed: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa yi ni gong du brjod do //
translated: The right and left faces were mentioned above.

original: zhal re re la'ang dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum mo //
analyzed: zhal re re la'ang dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum mo //
translated: Each face has three eyes, red and round.

original: 'khor lo yang rgyun mi 'chad par drag tu 'khor bas brtan par gnas pa lta bur 'bar ba'i tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo yang rgyun mi 'chad par drag tu 'khor bas brtan par gnas pa lta bur 'bar ba'i tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phro ba'o //
translated: The wheels also spin continuously and violently, so that it seems as if they are firmly established, radiating immeasurable masses of light.

original: de'i lte ba'i nang du 'og gi rtsibs kyi steng du chos 'byung gru gsum dkar po shin tu yangs pa'i nang du 'og gi zur la gnas pa'i sna tshogs padma'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i lte ba'i nang du 'og gi rtsibs kyi steng du chos 'byung gru gsum dkar po shin tu yangs pa'i nang du 'og gi zur la gnas pa'i sna tshogs padma'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pa'o //
translated: In the center of that, above the lower spokes, is a white tetrahedral source of phenomena, very spacious inside. In the center of that, in the lower corner, is a multicolored lotus with a multicolored vajra cross.

original: rdo rje de'i phyogs kyi ra rnams dang lte ba ni ji ltar rigs par rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i mdog dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje de'i phyogs kyi ra rnams dang lte ba ni ji ltar rigs par rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i mdog dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: The points of the vajra and the hub are the colors of Vairocana and so forth, as appropriate.

original: der rin po che kha dog lnga las yongs su rdzogs pa thub pa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba phyogs kyi 'khor lo thams cad sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer gyis khyab pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: der rin po che kha dog lnga las yongs su rdzogs pa thub pa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba phyogs kyi 'khor lo thams cad sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer gyis khyab pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: There, the completely perfect ma·πá·∏çala of the lords of sages is made of five-colored jewels, a luminous celestial mansion pervaded by multicolored light rays in all the surrounding areas.

original: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sku gur gum gyi mdog lta bu g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal nag po dang dkar po /
analyzed: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sku gur gum gyi mdog lta bu g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal nag po dang dkar po /
translated: In the middle of that is the Bhagavat, glorious Vajrasattva, Ma√±juvajra, the color of saffron, with a right and left face that are black and white.

original: rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
translated: With his two principal hands he embraces a wisdom consort similar to himself.

original: ral gri dang mda' dang autpala dang gzhu 'dzin pa rin po che'i cod pan can no //
analyzed: ral gri dang mda' dang autpala dang gzhu 'dzin pa rin po che'i cod pan can no //
translated: He holds a sword, an arrow, a blue lotus, and a bow, and he has a jeweled crown.

original: rin po che sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with various jewels.

original: 'od zer mtha' yas pa'o //
analyzed: 'od zer mtha' yas pa'o //
translated: He has infinite light rays.

original: de'i shar gyi phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad dkar po g-yas ba dang cig shos kyi zhal nag po dang dmar po phyag rnams na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po dang / ral gri dang nor bu dang padma'o //
analyzed: de'i shar gyi phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad dkar po g-yas ba dang cig shos kyi zhal nag po dang dmar po phyag rnams na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po dang / ral gri dang nor bu dang padma'o //
translated: To his east is white Vairocana, with a right and left face that are black and red. He holds a white eight-spoked wheel, a sword, a jewel, and a lotus.

original: lhor rin chen 'byung ldan ser bo rin po che markat zur dgu pa dang / ral gri dang 'khor lo dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: lhor rin chen 'byung ldan ser bo rin po che markat zur dgu pa dang / ral gri dang 'khor lo dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: To the south is yellow Ratnasa·πÉbhava, holding a nine-faceted jewel, a sword, a wheel, and a lotus.

original: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar po padma dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang / 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar po padma dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang / 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //

In the center of that, on top of lions, on a multicolored lotus, on a sun, is the Bhagavat Vairocana, white, sitting in vajra posture, with the radiance of the sun.

original: sangs rgyas lngas sbras pa'i ratna'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog can ratna sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang gos dang ldan pa zhi ba'i zhal bzhi dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang / phyag brgyad pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o //

translated: He has a crown of matted hair adorned with the five buddhas, and he is adorned with various jewel ornaments and garments. He has four peaceful faces, white, yellow, red, and green. He has eight arms. The two principal hands form the gesture of supreme enlightenment with a vajra.

original: gzhan gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o //üîΩg-yas pa gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //

original: g-yon pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo langs pa la g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ba byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o //

translated: The mudra of supreme enlightenment is made by raising the index finger of the left vajra fist and holding it with the right vajra fist.

original: shar gyi 'dab ma la sems ma rdo rje ma sngon mo g-yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa g-yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //

translated: On the eastern petal is blue Mind Vajrƒ´, holding a red five-pronged vajra with the right hand and a lasso with the left hand, which makes the threatening gesture.

translated: In the south is yellow Jewel Vajrƒ´, holding a jewel marked with a five-pronged vajra with the right hand and making the threatening gesture with the left hand.

original: g-yon pas padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pas padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: In the west is red Dharma Vajrƒ´, holding a red eight-petaled lotus marked with a five-pronged vajra with the right hand and holding a lotus with the left hand.

original: byang du las kyi rdo rje ma ljang gu g-yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog can 'dzin pa /

translated: Then, in the east, on the back of an elephant king, in the center of a variegated lotus, is blue Ak·π£obhya, in vajra posture.

analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa'o //

analyzed: kha cig ni phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pas 'gugs pa'i tshul byed pa'o zhes so //

analyzed: byang du rdo rje chags pa dmar po phyag g-yon dang cig shos rnam pa gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //

analyzed: nub tu rdo rje legs pa margad kyi mdog lta bu rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis snying gar legs so sbyin pa'i tshul byed pa'o //
translated: In the west, emerald Vajra Good holds a vajra and makes the gesture of granting bliss at his heart with his two hands.

analyzed: g-yas pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che gung mos bzung ste mchod sbyin gyi tshul byed pa ;

original: shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje rin chen ser po ni g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtha' gnyis la rdo rje gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'ching bar byed cing g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu snyems paüîΩdang bcas pas dkur brten pa'o //

translated: On the eastern petal is yellow Vajraratna, holding a vajra fist in the right hand, with two vajras at the tips marked with a jewel garland, binding the place of consecration, and holding a vajra bell in the left hand, with a sense of dignity resting on the hip.

analyzed: lho ru rdo rje gzi brjid dmar po snying gar phyag gnyis kyis 'dzin pa'i nyi mas gsal bar byed pa'o //

original: byang du rdo rje tog ljang gu g-yon gyi bar du lhur gnas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing 'phyar ba'o //

analyzed: nub tu rdo rje bzhad pa dkar bo g-yas pas so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa /

translated: In the west, on a peacock, on the anthers of a multicolored lotus, is red AmitƒÅbha, with the right leg pendant and the left drawn in, in vajra position.üîΩ

analyzed: pa phang pa'i steng du bzhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i g-yas pa'i gung mos rdo rjes mtshan pa'i padma 'dzin pa'o //

translated: In the south is Vajra-tƒ´k·π£·πáa, blue like the sky, holding a volume of the Perfection of Wisdom at the heart with the left hand and holding a sword in the manner of brandishing it with the right hand.

original: byang du rdo rje rgyu gser btso ma'i mdog can g-yon par gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa g-yas ba'i gung mo mgal me lta bu bskor zhing chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o //
